mapper.select: SELECT id username, email, createddate FROM account WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT id, username, email, createddate FROM account
SELECT email, username, createddate FROM account WHERE username = #{username} AND phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}
SELECT * FROM account WHERE email = #{email} AND #{enabled} = true
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account ( ip, enabled, createddate, modifiedDate, username, email, password, userRole, ageRange, birthday, gender, postcode, addr1, addr2, phoneNumber ) VALUES ( #{ip}, #{enabled}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{userRole}, #{ageRange}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{postcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{phoneNumber} )
mapper.update: UPDATE account SET ip = #{ip} username = #{username}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, enabled = #{enabled}, userRole = #{userRole}, ageRange = #{ageRange}, birthday = #{birthday}, gender = #{gender} modifiedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
